fields.comment: we share these based on the names, so make them unique

fields.comment: generates caves n, where n = random(cave_count_min, cave_count_max)

fields.comment: generates caves n, where n = random(cave_count_min, cave_count_max)

fields.comment: if set, will do the paths that go down near the center of the image, used for setting up the caves to coal mines near where player starts

fields.comment: if true, will do a hole straight down
fields.name: do_beginning_down

fields.comment: generates caves n from the surface, where n = random(surface_caves_count_min, surface_caves_count_max)

fields.comment: how strongly do we carve the cave
